recipesJson.name: UNICORN KITTY (lost art unicorn puke remix)
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description:
Spot on rainbow Sherbet I used VT lemon meringue tart for my lemon it lacks the Graham cracker note basically a lemon cream.. capella sweet tangerine has the artificial orange almost like tang lime Tahiti works it's magic and my goto raspberry Flavorart the whole recipe is melted together with Liquid barn vanilla icecream and Fa marshmallow. I added just a touch of Flavorah sour apple for tartness....stat safe everyone ðŸ˜Ž btw 
the original ejuice is a 60/40 blend .
